dcterms:description: The WHU-CD is a public building change detection dataset containing a pair of images with a spatial resolution of 0.2m and a size of 32507Ã—15354 pixels. The dataset is divided into training, validation, and test sets.
dcterms:title: WHU-CD

dcterms:creator: H. Chen
Z. Shi
dcterms:description: The LEVIR-CD dataset includes a total of 637 image pairs collected using Google Earth images with a spatial resolution of 0.5 m from 2002 to 2018. The dataset is divided into training, validation, and test sets.
dcterms:title: LEVIR-CD

dcterms:creator: Q. Shi
M. Liu
S. Li
X. Liu
F. Wang
L. Zhang
dcterms:description: The SYSU-CD is a newly public challenging dataset that includes a wide range of different types of changes, such as road expansion, change of vegetation, and sea construction. The dataset contains a total of 20000 pairs of high-resolution images.
dcterms:title: SYSU-CD
